title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: lightweight, extensible framework for running Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma and other LLMs locally on macOS, Linux, and Windows.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client for Ollama; chat, generate, embed, pull, list, delete models with a few lines of code.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Node & browsers; same API surface as the Python SDK.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration to use any Ollama model as an LLM or chat backend with LangChain abstractions.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (ChatGPT-like interface) with multi-user support, model management, and RAG uploads.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama; sync/async APIs, fluent builder pattern, Spring Boot starters.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Official Ruby gem for Ollama; idiomatic Ruby wrappers for chat, generate, embed, and model ops.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Interactive CLI wrapper around Ollama with conversation memory, syntax highlighting, and shell shortcuts.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that turns any Ollama model into a local GitHub Copilot replacement.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack 2.x integration to use Ollama generators and embedders in production pipelines.

title: ollama-cookbook
summary: Community recipes: PDF chat, voice bots, function calling, fine-tuning, Docker Compose stacks.

title: ollama-docker
summary: Official Docker image and compose samples with GPU (CUDA/ROCm) support for x86 & ARM.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Production-ready Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes with autoscaling and PVC.

title: ollama-gpt4all-importer
summary: Convert and quantize GPT4All models into Ollama’s Modelfile format for local usage.

title: ollama-model-registry
summary: Community-curated list of custom Modelfiles (CodeLlama, SQLCoder, Zephry, etc.) ready to pull.

title: ollama-discord-bot
summary: Self-hostable Discord bot that brings any Ollama model into servers with slash commands and threads.

title: ollama-slack-bot
summary: Slack Bolt app that adds /ollama slash command for private or channel-based LLM chats.

title: ollama-elixir
summary: Elixir library with GenServer behavior for streaming Ollama completions into Phoenix LiveView apps.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Async Rust client using reqwest; provides typed APIs for chat, generate, embeddings, and model ops.

title: ollama-mistral-finetune
summary: End-to-end repo showing how to fine-tune Mistral-7B on custom data and serve it via Ollama.
